actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to establish a locally oriented commission to assist the city of Berlin, New Hampshire, in identifying and studying its region's historical and cultural assets, and for other purposes.
short_title: Androscoggin River Valley Heritage Area Act

summary.text: Androscoggin River Valley Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Androscoggin River Valley Heritage Commission to study and report to the Congress, the Secretary of the Interior, and the State of New Hampshire on the Androscoggin River Valley's history and culture in New Hampshire. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Androscoggin River Valley Heritage Area Act
A bill to establish a locally oriented commission to assist the city of Berlin, New Hampshire, in identifying and studying its region's historical and cultural assets, and for other purposes.
